conclusion: Determine the gravitational force exerted by the remaining part of the sphere on the point mass m using superposition and gravitational force formula.
Calculate gravitational force due to original sphere: F_original = G * M * m / (4R^2).
Determine mass of removed sphere: M_removed = (1/8) * M.
Determine mass of remaining part: M_remaining = (7/8) * M.
Calculate gravitational force due to remaining part: F_remaining = G * (7/8) * M * m / (4R^2).
Calculate gravitational force due to removed part: F_removed = G * (1/8) * M * m / (4R^2).
Use superposition to find net gravitational force: F = F_original - F_removed = G * 7M * m / (32R^2).
